Uses of Package
com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.options

Packages that use com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.options
Package
Description
com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.options
Options used as metadata for executors or during task submission to the grid.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.options used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.options
    Class
    Description
    ClusterMember
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option specifying whether an Executor is running on a Coherence cluster member.
    Debugging
    An Task.Option to turn on the Debugging of a Task.
    Description
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option to specify the Description of a registered ExecutorService.
    Member
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option defining a Coherence Member.
    Name
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option to specify the Name of a registered ExecutorService.
    Role
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option to specify the Role of an Executor when it is registered.
    Storage
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option to specify whether an Executor is running on a storage enabled Coherence server.
